scripts.build: yarn workspace shared-core build && yarn workspace shared-components build && yarn workspace web build
scripts.deploy: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn now
scripts.dev: yarn workspace shared-core build && yarn workspace shared-components build && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace shared-core build -w" "yarn workspace shared-components build -w" "yarn workspace web start" "yarn workspace mobile start"
scripts.patch-package: if test "$NOW" = "1"; then cd .; else patch-package; fi
